General.Name: GD Power Development Co Ltd
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: GD Power Development Co.,Ltd operates as a power generation company in China. The company generates electricity through thermal power, hydropower, wind power, photovoltaic, coal, chemical, and other sources. Its total installed capacity is approximately 97.381 million kilowatts. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Beijing, China. GD Power Development Co.,Ltd operates as a subsidiary of China Energy Investment Group Co., Ltd.
General.Address: No. 19, Anhui North Li'an Park, Beijing, China, 100101
